title: Kotlin - Programiz
description: Kotlin is a relatively new programming language developed by JetBrains for modern multiplatform applications. Our Kotlin tutorial will guide you to learn Kotlin one step at a time with the help of examples.

title: Kotlin - W3schools
description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
